TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ApplicationPgpEncrypted extends MimeKit.MimePart

Docs.summary: A MIME part with a Content-Type of application/pgp-encrypted.
Docs.remarks: An application/pgp-encrypted part will typically be the first child of a part and contains only a Version header.
